title: France to Ban Food Imports Containing EU-Prohibited Pesticides
description: France plans to prohibit food imports from South America or elsewhere that contain pesticides banned for use in the European Union.
content: France plans to prohibit food imports from South America or elsewhere that contain pesticides banned for use in the European Union.
